Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.events.userinput

Interface MouseButtonReleasedListener

All Superinterfaces:
NodeProvider
public interface MouseButtonReleasedListener
extends NodeProvider
Being a MouseButtonReleasedListener enables the YaegerEntity to be notified if a MouseButton has been released while the mouse pointer is on the YaegerEntity.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void attachMouseReleasedListener()
    Attach a MouseButtonReleasedListener to this entity.
    void onMouseButtonReleased​(javafx.scene.input.MouseButton button, double x, double y)
    Called when the corresponding Node receives a mouse released event.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

    getGameNode

  • Method Details

    • onMouseButtonReleased

      void onMouseButtonReleased​(javafx.scene.input.MouseButton button, double x, double y)
      Called when the corresponding Node receives a mouse released event.
      Parameters:
      button - the MouseButton being released.
      x - The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer while being released as a double.
      y - The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer while being released as a double.

    • attachMouseReleasedListener

      default void attachMouseReleasedListener()
      Attach a MouseButtonReleasedListener to this entity.
